column.name: recid
column.comment: auto-incremented field to ensure each record in db is unique

column.name: soundingid
column.comment: record id field which is the autoincremented record counter in the header table

column.name: id
column.comment: TSR id, either WMO or WBAN id or other (general 4-6 digits)

column.name: idflag
column.comment: Flag to indicate if id is WMO,WBAN or OTHR
